summary: Diff implements expanded 7-task checklist with per-task required+checked fields, adds backend migration, updates case form to select required tasks, updates case card to show only required tasks with completion toggles, and updates CSV utilities to export/import all 7 task columns with warnings for unrecognized columns.

hallucinated_features.description: CSV import UX/semantics specify that empty task cells mean “task not required” and Yes/No indicates “task required and completion status”.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 requires adding 7 task columns, backward compatibility, and English warnings for ignored columns, but does not specify the meaning/encoding of CSV task cell values or that empties explicitly imply not-required.
